feature_defs.trigger: at the start of your turn
effects: You can expend 1 Focus Point to imbue yourself with elemental energy for 10 minutes (ends if you have the Incapacitated condition).
Reach: your unarmed strike reach increases by 10 feet.
Elemental Strikes: your unarmed strikes can deal acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage instead of their normal type.
When you deal one of these types, you can force the target to make a Strength save; on a failed save, you move it up to 10 feet toward or away from you.
You know the Elementalism spell; Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.
You expend 2 Focus Points to create a 20-foot-radius sphere within 120 feet.
Choose a damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder).
Creatures in the sphere make a Dexterity save; on a failed save, a creature takes damage equal to three rolls of your Martial Arts die, or half as much on a success.
You gain a fly speed and a swim speed equal to your speed.
Damage Resistance: you gain resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (choose one); you can change the choice at the start of each of your turns.

Destructive Stride: when you use Step of the Wind, your speed increases by 20 feet this turn; creatures of your choice take damage equal to one Martial Arts die the first time you enter a space within 5 feet of them this turn (type matches your choice).
Empowered Strikes: once on each of your turns, you deal extra damage equal to one Martial Arts die when you hit with an unarmed strike (same type as the strike).
